foreignData.name: Zeitkaskaden
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines Jeder Spieler mischt die Karten auf seiner Hand und in seinen Friedhof in seine Bibliothek; oder jeder Spieler zieht sieben Karten.
Verflechtung {2} (Bestimme beides, falls du die Verflechtungskosten bezahlst.)

foreignData.name: Cascada temporal
foreignData.text:
Elige uno: Cada jugador baraja su mano y su cementerio en su biblioteca; o cada jugador roba siete cartas
Entrelazar {2}. (Si pagas el coste de entrelazar, juega ambas opciones.)

foreignData.name: Cascade temporelle
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un Chaque joueur mélange sa main et son cimetière à sa bibliothèque ; ou chaque joueur pioche sept cartes.
Union {2} (Choisissez les deux si vous payez le coût d'union.)

foreignData.name: Cascata Temporale
foreignData.text:
Scegli una delle opzioni seguenti Ogni giocatore rimescola la propria mano e il proprio cimitero nel proprio grimorio; oppure ogni giocatore pesca sette carte.
Intrecciare {2} (Scegli entrambe se paghi il costo di intrecciare.)

foreignData.name: 時間の滝
foreignData.text:
以下の２つから１つを選ぶ。「各プレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーに自分の手札と墓地を加えて切りなおす。」「各プレイヤーはカードを７枚引く」
双呪 {2} （双呪コストを支払った場合、両方を選ぶ。）

foreignData.name: Cascata Temporal
foreignData.text:
Escolha um Cada jogador embaralha os cards de sua própria mão e cemitério em seu próprio grimório; ou, cada jogador compra sete cards.
Entrelaçar {2} (Escolha ambos se pagar o custo de entrelaçar.)

name: Temporal Cascade
originalText:
Choose one Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library; or each player draws seven cards.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

rulings.text: This card won’t be put into your graveyard until after it’s finished resolving, which means it won’t be shuffled into your library as part of its own effect.

text:
Choose one —
• Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library.
• Each player draws seven cards.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
